## Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [**CONTRIBUTING.md**](https://github.com/elastic/go-elasticsearch/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md) document.
- [ ] I have signed the [**Contributor License Agreement (CLA)**](https://www.elastic.co/contributor-agreement).
- [ ] My code follows the code style of this project.
- [ ] I have run `make test` locally and all tests passed.
- [ ] I have added tests to cover my changes.
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly.
